troubleshooting.title: What to do when an omelet will not turn over

condition.p: Sometimes, an omelet will fold over because it gets stuck to the pan, or otherwise falls apart when you are attempting to turn it over.

cause.title: Not enough oil
cause.p: When there is not enough oil added in the pan, the omelet can stick to the pan and will not fold over.

step.cmd: Look at the pan to see if there is an oily film on it.
Add more oil to the pan. Oftentimes, however, it is too late to do anything about it.
Make the omelet into a fritatta or scramble instead. Still delicious and tastest the same!
